nodes.text: The Nebula Raiders were a group of pilots who served the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic. A constant source of trouble for the Republic, the Raiders would raid supply convoys using gun tugs and Z-95 Headhunters.

The Nebula Raiders were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products. They were originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they were first mentioned in Starships of the Galaxy, a 2001 supplement written by Owen K.C. Stephens for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
